resources.string: We failed to find Pokemon for you. Please try again later.

Sorry, we don't have any Pokemon data matching your search criteria. {ion-sad-outline} Here's what you can do to change that:

1. Click the {ion-ios-bookmarks} button to add Pokemon data to your area!
2. Click the {ion-android-share-alt} to share Poke Spotter with your friends!
3. Click the {ion-android-search} to expand your search.
